document_data.name: Argentor
document_data.mainbody: '''Argentor''' was a village of [[earthsoul genasi]] located in southern [[Tethyr]] within the [[Mir Spires]].
document_data.Description: The village's dwellings were hollowed out from the spires by the [[genasi]] using their innate ability to shape rock.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], Argentor was attacked by [[minotaur]]s sent by the ruler of [[Calimport]] to abduct his long lost son, [[Cephas]], who was traveling with a circus giving a performance at the village.
